abstract: China stepped up its campaign against the Anglo-Australian mining giant Rio Tinto, saying the company had bribed virtually every one of China’s big steel makers.
snippet: China stepped up its campaign against the Anglo-Australian mining giant Rio Tinto, saying the company had bribed virtually every one of China’s big steel makers.
lead_paragraph: China stepped up its campaign against the Anglo-Australian mining giant Rio Tinto on Wednesday, saying the company had bribed virtually every one of China’s big steel makers, The New York Times’s David Barboza writes.

headline.main: Rio Tinto Bribed Most Big Steel Makers, China Says
